events.title: SHORT HAND CRICKET TOURNAMENT
events.description: Inter-college cricket tournament featuring exciting matches and competitive spirit.
events.fullDescription: Join us for an exhilarating cricket tournament that brings together the best teams from across colleges. The tournament features Short Hand Cricket format matches with knockout stages leading to an exciting final. Teams will compete for the championship trophy and individual awards for outstanding performances.

events.title: FUTSAL CHAMPIONSHIP
events.description: Annual football championship with intense matches and skilled players.
events.fullDescription:
Rules:
Every match will be played in knockout basis
Number of players (5+3)
Referees decision will be final
Coordinator has the right to modify rules according to necessity
If a player /team fails to report on time then the opponent will be given walkover
Modifications in playing format can be done in case of shortage of time and other issues

events.title: Women's Handball Tournament
events.description: Fast-paced handball tournament featuring skilled teams and exciting matches.
events.fullDescription:
VIBGYOR WOMEN HANDBALL 2025

Rules:
1. Teams consist of 5 + 2
2. The Game is played in two 10-minute halves with a break in between.
3. Players can move the ball by passing, dribbling, or hitting it with any part of the body above the knee, but not with their feet (except for the goalkeeper within the goal area).
4. Game coordinators have right to change the rules

events.title: Badminton Championship
events.description: Individual and doubles badminton tournament with various categories.
events.fullDescription:
Rules:

Match Format: Knockout
Qualifiers: Best of 15 points (1 set)
Coordinator's Decision: Final
Late Reporting: Walkover awarded to opponent
Rule Modifications: Coordinator reserves the right to modify rules as needed.
Team Eligibility: All college teams are welcome. Player authenticity will be verified with college IDs.
If a player wants to participate in both singles and doubles, they have to fill out the Google form twice.
For registration in doubles, either player can fill out the form on behalf of both participants.

events.title: Table Tennis Tournament
events.description: Individual and doubles table tennis competition with multiple categories.
events.fullDescription:
Rules and Regulations:

Each match will be played on a knockout basis leading to the qualifiers.
Knockouts will be played to 11 points (best of 3 matches).
Qualifiers will be played to 21 points (best of 5 matches).
If a player/team fails to report to the ground on time, the opponent will be given a walkover.
Players should bring their own rackets. TT balls will be provided by the coordinator.
In the Doubles event, matches will be played to 11 points (best of 3 matches), and the qualifiers will be played to 21 points (best of 5 matches).
Mixed doubles are allowed. The registration for mixed doubles will be on spot. (This rule is subjected to change according to the decision of the coordinator).
If a player wants to participate in both singles and doubles, they have to fill out the Google form twice.
For registration in doubles, either player can fill out the form on behalf of both participants.
The coordinator has the right to modify the rules as necessary.
The decision of the coordinator will be final.

events.title: Chess Tournament (U-9)
events.description: Chess tournament for players under 9 years of age.
events.fullDescription: The U-9 chess tournament is designed to nurture young chess talents. Players will compete in a Swiss system format with multiple rounds. The tournament includes special prizes for different age groups and recognition for outstanding performances.

events.title: Chess Tournament (Open)
events.description: Open chess tournament for all age groups.
events.fullDescription: The open chess tournament welcomes players of all age groups and skill levels. The tournament features a Swiss system format with multiple rounds. Special categories for different rating groups and age categories are included.

events.title: Flash Events
events.fullDescription: Hit the Wicket, Goal in the Hole, Carrom, Dart, Sequence and many more
